project.description:
A trivial extension of the abstract Ondex data source, which has zero parameters in the constructor and can be configured completely via file. The aratiny project uses this and contains example of how to set it up.
This project contains one class only, but we need it as a separated Maven project, since there is a Spring-based bootstrap in Knetminer-ws and it expects one instance only of ConfigurableOndexDataSource.
